title: Addressed To Her: A Short Story
description: Being the sole bearer of the truth, and responsible for delivering a package of grave importance, Harshvardhan Singh travels to the address of the addressee, only to find himself in the midst of a celebratory household. Knowing his very life hangs by a fragile thread, will he be able to deliver the package in time, before everything he has ever known obliterates into nothingness?
author: Granthana Sinha
